About Text: Having experience of about 30 Years in the field of Accounts and Direct Taxation. Worked with a listed company in the field of Manufacturing of Manmade Fibre and Polymers. Having an annual group turnover of more than 5000 Crores.

Experience Data.title: General Manager Accounts & Direct Taxation
Experience Data.description: Joined JBFIL in August 1997, which is in the field of Manmade fiber and PET Manufacturing. JBFIL is a public company listed on both BSE & NSE. JBFIL has three manufacturing plants located in Village Athola and Saily, Silvassa, UT, and Sarigam, Gujarat. Started career with the company as Accounts Officer, responsible for day-to-day accounting. Awarded with additional responsibilities over the years, including heading the team to implement ERP, vendor payment approval, head for direct taxation, working capital management, internal financial controls, and more.

Experience Data.title: Officer
Experience Data.description: Worked with the company for three years and gained good experience in the field of project finance, such as preparation of financial proposals and project reports, and appraisal of proposals by banks and financial institutions.

Education Data.schoolName: Institute of Chartered Accountants of India
Education Data.degreeField: Chartered Accountant, Accounts, Taxation, and Company Law
